channel.title: The Straits Times Singapore News
channel.description: The Straits Times - Get exclusive stories, in-depth analyses and award-winning multimedia content about Singapore, Asia and the world.

item.title: The Straits Times remains best read title, with clear shift to digital, across all age groups: survey
item.description:
September 20, 2021 5:00 AM

The Straits Times remains the most widely accessed title, read by 44 per cent of people aged 15 and above in Singapore.

item.title: Pilot scheme seeks to tackle root causes of frequent accident and emergency visits
item.description:
September 20, 2021 5:00 AM

In 2018, the top 60 people who visited KTPH's accident and emergency department had a total of more than 1,200 visits.

item.title: Senior SAF volunteers take on more roles
item.description:
September 20, 2021 5:00 AM

Among the increased responsibilities for more senior SVs is being a detachment in-charge of newer SVs.

item.title: Archifest split into 100 events across S'pore in October
item.description:
September 20, 2021 5:00 AM

These include tours of Singapore's built and natural heritage, as well as workshops and talks.

item.title: MPs seek to raise awareness of mental health to encourage people to seek help
item.description:
September 20, 2021 5:00 AM

Participating MPs will be organising guided discussions on mental health and suicide prevention.

item.title: Take in sights and food of Geylang Serai with heritage trail and book
item.description:
September 20, 2021 5:00 AM

The Geylang Serai Heritage Trail Book provides walking routes in the neighbourhood.

item.title: S'pore counsellors face burnout as more people seek therapy amid Covid-19 pandemic
item.description:
September 20, 2021 5:00 AM

More people are seeking help for mental health concerns and stress related to employment and family relationships.

item.title: Science Talk: Why marine sciences are important for Singapore
item.description:
September 20, 2021 5:00 AM

The seas are treasure troves of biodiversity, wells of untapped resources, and also help to connect Singapore to South-east Asia and beyond.

item.title: As parrot-keeping takes flight, researchers urge greater regulation of domestic trade
item.description:
September 20, 2021 5:00 AM

Researchers say more regulation is needed to reduce poaching pressure on the wild populations of parrots.

item.title: Get 50% off at $4.95 per month with annual subscription to The Straits Times
item.description:
September 20, 2021 5:00 AM

SINGAPORE - Readers can save 50 per cent off the first year of subscribing to The Straits Times under the newest One Digital subscription deal, paying only $4.95 each month.

item.title: New Covid-19 community care facilities to be set up for stable patients with underlying conditions
item.description:
September 20, 2021 12:17 AM

The first such facility at the NTUC Health nursing home in Tampines will start operations on Thursday (Sept 23).

item.title: 1,012 new Covid-19 cases in S'pore; second day in a row new infections cross 1,000 mark
item.description:
September 20, 2021 12:14 AM

919 cases were in the community, 90 were among dormitory residents, and three cases were imported.
